Name: worker_availability_constraint
Description: A worker must have an availability status of 'available' to be assigned to a task.

Name: team_size_limit
Description: The team size must be within the recommended Scrum range (e.g., 3 to 9).

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: A sprint must not exceed its planned end date.

Name: project_budget_constraint
Description: The total cost of the project must not exceed the allocated budget.

Name: task_skill_requirement
Description: A worker assigned to a task must possess the required skill for it.

Name: epic_completion_dependency
Description: An Epic can only be marked as 'done' if all its User Stories are 'done'.

Name: one_product_owner_per_team
Description: Each team must be associated with exactly one Product Owner.

Name: one_scrum_master_per_team
Description: Each team must be associated with exactly one Scrum Master.

Name: task_status_dependency
Description: A User Story can only be 'done' if all its tasks are 'done'.

Name: blocker_resolution_for_task
Description: A task cannot be completed if it has an active blocker.

Name: release_after_sprint_end
Description: The planned release date must be after the end date of the sprints containing its features.

Name: sprint_backlog_effort_limit
Description: The total effort of tasks in a Sprint Backlog should not exceed the team's velocity.

Name: user_story_in_one_sprint
Description: A user story can only be assigned to one active sprint at a time.
